channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Shantz WordPress QOTD

item.title: CVE-2021-24380|2024-08-03T19:28:23.765Z -- unknown -- shantz%20wordpress%20qotd
item.description: The Shantz WordPress QOTD WordPress plugin through 1.2.2 is lacking any CSRF check when updating its settings, allowing attackers to make logged in administrators change them to arbitrary values.
